headline: APA Corporation Announces First-Quarter 2025 Financial and Operational Results
summary: HOUSTON, May 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- APA Corporation (Nasdaq: APA) today announced first-quarter 2025 results. Results can be found on the company’s website by visiting www.apacorp.com or investor.apacorp.com. APA will host a conference call on May 8 at 10 a.m. Central time via the webcast link available on the company website to discuss the results. Following the conference call, a replay will be available for one year on the “Investors” page of the company’s website. About APA APA Corpora
